events:
  - name: NetworkClient.ConnectionAccepted
    summary: |
      Fired when the client successfully connects to a server. Returns a string
      showing the server's IP and port, and the client's
      Class.ClientReplicator.
    description: |
      Fired when the client successfully connects to a server. Returns a string
      showing the server's IP and Port, and the client's
      Class.ClientReplicator.
    codesamples: []
    parameters:
      - name: peer
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          The server's IP and port.
      - name: replicator
        type: Instance
        default:
        summary: |
          The client's Class.ClientReplicator.
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    capabilities: []
  - name: NetworkClient.ConnectionFailed
    summary: |
      Fired if the client fails to connect to the server.
    description: |
      Fired if the client fails to connect to the server.
    codesamples: []
    parameters:
      - name: peer
        type: string
        default:
        summary: |
          The server's IP and port.
      - name: code
        type: int
        default:
        summary: |
          The error code representing why the client failed to connect.
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security: None
    capabilities: []
